headlines.headline: Will Vikings commit to starting a QB addition over McCarthy?
headlines.description: How the Vikings handle their QB room will reveal a lot about what they think of McCarthy's future in Minnesota.

headlines.headline: WR Mike Evans to meet with Buccaneers ahead of free agency
headlines.description: Tampa Bay's all-time leading receiver is exploring his options ahead of his 13th season.

headlines.headline: Chargers 2026 offseason: Big questions ahead of free agency
headlines.description: We answered three big questions about the Chargers' plans ahead of 2026 free agency.

headlines.headline: Pittsburgh at NFL combine: QB reset in store for Steelers?
headlines.description: Aaron Rodgers isn't a long-term solution, but he could be a bridge as Pittsburgh looks for a franchise QB.

headlines.headline: How does an NFL player decide to retire? 'I'm not done'
headlines.description: Eric Weddle, Tony Jefferson and Andrew Whitworth share stories of their journeys in and out of retirement.

headlines.headline: 3 big questions as Mike Rutenberg takes over Browns' defense
headlines.description: The former Falcons assistant will have his hands full addressing Cleveland's scheme, free agents and roster.

headlines.headline: Brady Tkachuk on U.S.-Canada rivalry: 'There's hatred there'
headlines.description: On the eve of the Olympic gold medal game, Brady Tkachuk said for the U.S. to win its ultimate goal, his teammates will have to take down Canada, the team they both envy and despise.

headlines.headline: Ex-NHL great Jaromir Jagr eyes retirement in 38th pro season
headlines.description: The storied hockey career of Jaromir Jagr might be coming to an end. Currently in his 38th season, with his hometown Kladno Knights in the Czech league, the former NHL great strongly suggested that fans might not get to see him on the ice anymore.

headlines.headline: Olympics 2026 men's hockey: Standings, stats, schedule, more
headlines.description: It's down to four teams left for three medals. Find the schedule, scoring and goaltending leaders and medal round bracket here.

headlines.headline: U.S. pays tribute to Gaudreau brothers at Winter Olympics
headlines.description: The U.S. men's hockey team will play for gold against Canada and it has honored Johnny Gaudreau's memory along the way.

headlines.headline: Olympic hockey betting odds: Canada slight gold medal favorites over United States
headlines.description: Who are the favorites and underdogs in the men's 2026 Olympic ice hockey tournaments?

headlines.headline: U.S. men's hockey routs Slovakia, into gold medal game vs. Canada
headlines.description: Jack Hughes scored two goals, and the U.S. rolled into the final by routing Slovakia 6-2 in the semifinals Friday night. The U.S. will meet tournament favorite and top-seeded Canada on Sunday for the title.
